<MembersIndexItem

A simplified binary data writer class that doesn&#39;t require targets, target definitions, architectures, or require any other optional compile time libraries to be enabled via the build process. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gsym/filewriter/#details">More...</a>

<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// position. The entire contents of Str will be written into the steam at</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// written. It is up to the user to ensure that Str doesn&#39;t contain any NULL</Highlight></CodeLine>
